"Special Mission: Magatsu [Silver]":
"On Harkotan, we managed to weaken
and contain the Kuronites and Magatsu
in a section near the Sealed Grounds.
ARKS who are willingly able to take on
resealing Magatsu, should sortie now.
A.I.S. units will be available and are highly
recommended for use in this mission.
――――――――――――――――――――
Start: Use Bonus Key Magatsu [Silver]
Clear: Defeat enemies before time is up."
